summary: This is a standard Office of the Inspector General (OIG) form used to document warnings and assurances given to a voluntary interviewee. It indicates an OIG investigation is being conducted, but the specific subject of the investigation is redacted. The form includes a waiver signed by the employee agreeing to participate voluntarily.
keyFacts: The document is a Department of Justice OIG form for voluntary employee interviews.
The specific subject of the OIG investigation is fully redacted.
The form provides legal warnings and assurances to the interviewee that participation is voluntary.
A waiver at the bottom indicates an employee agreed to participate without coercion.
The form template date is April 23, 2007, but the interview date is not filled in.
